info.name: Humble Bundle - Stop hiding platforms
info.description: A SteamLUG user complained that by default, Humble’s Bundle pages hide the platform exceptions, making it a chore to know if any of the titles support Linux.
info.additionalInfo:
2015-02-25, noticed storefront platform support was hidden behind hover too, fix that…

2015-02-11, Second, Increased size for platform icons, tidied the presentation a little…

2015-02-11, First, it works, could look a little better…
